first_para: Graham Peter Jones (born 3 March 1966) is a British Labour Party politician and the current Member of Parliament (MP) for Hyndburn.

full.extract:
Graham Peter Jones (born 3 March 1966) is a British Labour Party politician and the current Member of Parliament (MP) for Hyndburn.
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 2015-04-23. 
^ "List of members returned to serve in parliament 2010". The London Gazette. Retrieved 20 May 2010. 
^ "Election 2010: Constituency: Hyndburn". BBC News. Retrieved 7 May 2010.
full.title: Graham Jones (politician)
